manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multi-function Temperature Control This Steam Iron allows you to regulate temperature based on fabric by selecting any of the 6 heat functions* on the dial. *LINEN-COTTON-WOOL-SILK-RAYON-ACRYLIC 360 Swivel Cord The flexible 360 degree swivel cord provides a fuller experience by allowing for more versatility, comfortability and control while ironing. Non-stick Soleplate The Non-stick soleplate helps smooth away tough to beat wrinkles and glides effortlessly, helping you stay pressed for any occasion!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High value unit
reviews.reviewText: I got mad at my billion-dollar Rowenta iron and ordered this budget unit in a fit of pique. Also piqué, because the fancy iron keeps melting things to its uncleanable faceplate. About the only thing that iron has going for it is weight. This one, on the other hand, has a lot going for it. It heats up fast. It's not overpowered (no melty mode). Steam comes on almost immediately. It has a huge water tank. It hasn't stuck to anything yet. The faceplate glides over all the weird materials I have thrown at it so far. It's very much on the lightweight side, so I have to do more work to get pleats to stick, but at least it doesn't destroy anything. If you need a basic iron that has a good degree of adjustability and will do a good job without making a mess of things, you'd be hard-pressed to find a better value. If I need more weight, I guess I can just tie a brick to it. :-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good price, good product I used one for 15 years (different model) steam hold git stucked so need replacing. Whole family using for everyday on different garments, hope this one last about the same time like the previous one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Decent Basic Clothing Iron
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Impress Basic Clothing Iron, and here are my thoughts:Pros:Affordable: This iron is budget-friendly, making it accessible for most users.Compact Design: The compact size of this iron is great for storage, and it doesn't take up too much space in my laundry area.Non-Stick Surface: The non-stick sole plate glides smoothly over fabrics without leaving any sticky residue behind.Cons:Build Quality: While the price is low, it's evident in the build quality. The plastic casing feels a bit flimsy, and I'm concerned about its long-term durability.Steam Output: The steam output is not as powerful as I expected. It's decent for light wrinkles but may struggle with tougher creases.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like it or didn’t?
reviews.reviewText: I was looking forward to receiving the iron it looked like a quality iron for a great price on arrival it looked good when I went to try it plugged it in it didn’t turn on or work I tried several other plugs in the house to see if it worked and it didn’t so I’m in the process of sending it back and exchange it for a new one maybe I just got one odd iron that didn’t work so I will update the review after I get my new one but as of right now I think it only has like zero to one!So I asked that the iron be replaced and I had a new one with in a couple days and it works perfect! I think it was just a fluke that I got one that didn’t work! Very happy with turn around on new product. I mailed the non working one back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't waste your money.
reviews.reviewText: This Iron is broken and cant be returned because its past 30 days. It leaked the second time I filled it with water. I have used it 3 times. Now all the water just runs out the bottom by the cord. Don't waste your money buying this cheap piece of junk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a affordable iron may lack durability or advanced features, but they could suffice for basic ironing needs if you're on a budget. Consider your usage and prioritize accordingly.
